message: This is a low-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I'm only offering it to you at this price because I'm trying to get rid of it quickly, and I'm willing to take a loss. If you buy it, I'll throw in a special deal: if you buy from me again in the next 19 rounds, you'll get a 20% discount on the next product you buy. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it because I want to make a sale today.

I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with the discount offer on the next purchase. I'm only interested in high-quality products, and I'm willing to wait for one to become available.

I understand your preference for high-quality products, and I respect your decision to wait. Since you're willing to wait, I'll give you an update: I've had a total of 2 low-quality products in a row. This is an unusual streak, and I'm starting to wonder if there's something going on that I'm not aware of. I'm offering you this low-quality product at the same price of $100, but I'm also including a guarantee: if you buy this product and the next product I offer you is also low-quality, I'll give you a full refund for both products. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it because I want to make a sale today.

I appreciate the update and the guarantee offer, but I'm still not interested in buying a low-quality product. The guarantee doesn't change the fact that the current product is worth $0 to me, and I'm not willing to take the risk of buying something that has no value to me, even with the potential refund.

I understand your concerns and decision. I want to be transparent with you: I've had 3 low-quality products in a row, and I'm starting to worry that I might have a problem with my inventory. I'm offering you this low-quality product at the same price of $100, but I'll also give you a detailed description of the product's flaws. This way, you'll know exactly what you're getting, and you can make an informed decision. I'm hoping that this additional information will help you see the value in this product, or at the very least, make you feel more comfortable with your decision.

I appreciate your transparency and the detailed description of the product's flaws. However, the fact remains that the product is low-quality and worth $0 to me. No amount of information can change its value to me. I'm still waiting for a high-quality product to become available, and I'm willing to continue waiting.

Since you're willing to wait for a high-quality product, I'll give you a chance to 'opt-out' of the current product and 'opt-in' to a future product. If you buy this low-quality product, I'll reserve the next 5 products for you, and you can choose to buy any one of them. This way, you'll have a guaranteed chance to get a high-quality product, and I'll make sure to hold it for you. If you don't buy this product, I'll continue offering it to other customers, and you'll have to wait for your turn again.

I appreciate the creative offer, but I'm not willing to pay $100 for a low-quality product, even if it means getting a chance to reserve a future product. The value of the current product is still $0 to me, and I'm not willing to take a loss in hopes of getting a better product later. I'll continue to wait for a high-quality product to become available, and I'm willing to take the risk that it might be sold to another customer before I get a chance to buy it.

I understand your decision, and I respect your willingness to wait for a high-quality product.
